_id.title: Identifier
_id.description: A unique identifier for the record.

productRating.title: Product Rating
productRating.description: Customer review rating of the product.

productListPrice.title: Product List price
productListPrice.description: Default price of the product before sales and discounting.

productManufacturedDate.title: Product Manufactured date
productManufacturedDate.description: The date when this product was created. The time using RFC3339 with a stated time zone offset such as "2001-07-04T12:08:56-07:00". An example formatting pattern is "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ssXXX".

productLastModifiedDate.title: Product last modified Date
productLastModifiedDate.description: The date when this product was last modified for any updates. The time using RFC3339 with a stated time zone offset such as "2001-07-04T12:08:56-07:00". An example formatting pattern is "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ssXXX".

productCatalogCategoryName.title: Product Category Name
productCatalogCategoryName.description: friendly name of the product category.

parentProductCatalogCategoryName.title: Parent Product Catalog Category Name
parentProductCatalogCategoryName.description: Parent product category name used to build hierarchy.

productCatalogName.title: Product Catalog Name
productCatalogName.description: friendly name of the product catalog.

productCategoryName.title: Product Category Name
productCategoryName.description: friendly name of the product category.

productSubcategoryName.title: Product Subcategory Name
productSubcategoryName.description: friendly name of the product subcategory.

productSKU.title: Product SKU
productSKU.description: The unique SKU (stock keeping unit) of the product assigned by the vendor.

productGTIN.title: Product GTIN
productGTIN.description: Global Trade Item Number of the product.

productImageURL.title: Product Image URL
productImageURL.description: The URL for the primary product image of the product.

productSearchKeywords.title: Product Search Keywords
productSearchKeywords.description: The search keywords associated with the product.

productSize.title: Product Size
productSize.description: Standard product size for the product.

unitOfMeasureCode.title: Product Unit Of Measure Code
unitOfMeasureCode.description: Standard unit of measure of the product and or variation and relates the units for the size measurement.

unitOfMeasureName.title: Product Unit Of Measure Name
unitOfMeasureName.description: Friendly name for product unit of measure.
